more-info.title: Information
more-info.body:
Your professional email address may change throughout your career if you change jobs, branches or companies...

Moreover, we cannot guarantee the confidentiality of your account if you use a professional email address.

To ensure that you always have access to your myPrimobox account, even when you are not working, you must have access to your login email at all times.

Entering your personal email address will allow you to access your documents at any time.
